Texto: 
not available
surgery followed by chemotherapy and radiation therapy
• very large right hemisphere lesion with cystic and solid components.
• irregular heterogeneous enhancement.
• entrapment of the temporal horn of the right lateral ventricle.
anaplastic oligodendroglioma
• astrocytoma
• gliosarcoma
• gbm - glioblastoma multiforme
• hemangiopericytoma (if extraaxial)
• metastatic disease
34 year old man presents to er with first seizure.
long history of headaches.
